metadata.name: METAHC - 001
metadata.description:
META HAMMERS is a collection made by a group of friends that's just having fun and enjoying life.

This first NFT is all about the unbreakable, the legendary and the magnificent... NOKIA 3310.

This is the strongest hammer ever made by a human being. It can end wars but also bring destruction if in wrong hands.

We have a lot of ideas that require your support. 
You can join our Discord server (link in my profile).

We don't have a lot of benefits to offer, for now, but we can give you, for sure, our friendship!
